name: GLYN UI2 Starter Kit
description: The GLYN UI2 is an evaluation kit for the RZ/G2L MPU. It ships with a display so that you can quickly get started with your UI development.
shortDescription: GLYN UI2 evaluation kit for the RZ/G2L MPU
getStartedInstructions:
1. Open the project folder and update the submodules: `git submodule update --init --recursive` 
2. Follow the guide in the [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lvgl/lv_port_linux/master/boards/glyn_ui2-starter-kit/README.md)
